i have a timeshare in mexico.
I do not have any children, but I love my family and Netflix.

participant_2.background:
I like to go on websites about cats and fashion.
my parents met at woodstock.
I always make time for a good anime before work, and I always pack a banana for my morning run.
i had to drop out of college to help with my grandparents.
I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going well! I just finished watching an anime and I'm about to start my morning run.
Nice! What anime were you watching?
I was watching The Promised Neverland. It's about a group of orphans who find out their orphanage is actually a farm for demons to eat humans.
Wow, that sounds intense! I've never heard of it before.
It's really good! I definitely recommend it.
I'll have to check it out. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into anime music right now.
Oh cool! I've never really listened to anime music before.
You should check out the soundtrack from The Promised Neverland. It's really good!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, go to concerts, and spend time with my family.
Oh cool! I like to play music too. What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and the piano.
Oh nice! I play the guitar too.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of music, but I'm really into blues and rock.
I like blues and rock too!
Oh cool! We should jam sometime!
That would be fun!
Great! I'll bring my guitar.
Awesome! I'll bring mine too.
